title: 04/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/05/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin witnessed Gonzaga evolve from a David into Goliath this weekend winning over UCLA. Jalen Suggs benefitted from playing in college, allowing the world to hear his story. Many first round quarterbacks have busted in the NFL, but Trevor Lawrence will hit. Plus, another edition of Where Colin Was Right / Wrong.

Guest : Marcedes Lewis - GB WR

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
